Jekyll is cool

23 Jun 2015
My first post in a new Jekyll-based blog!

I found Jekyll much more powerful than txt2site.

Several useful links if you want to make your Jekyll-based blog:

  • Jekyll docs
  • How I Created a Beautiful and Minimal Blog Using Jekyll, Github Pages, and poole
  • Use txt2tags markup in Jekyll Extremely useful if you need to move some of your old content from txt2site to Jekyll

Github repo with the sources of this blog can be found here: https://github.com/vitalyrepin/vrepinblog
